description: Didn't work for me, instructions on this, need to be better explained and concisely as well, had to jump through hoops. nonfree repository, how come that option wasn't there before I even tried to install this and me manually doing the nonfree repository too, escapes me for a lot of reasons. I just check now, is now there, still had to fall back to nouveau.

It just does not work. In Fedora i tried installing from the store, after which it showed some error. So, I tried installing from terminal, that worked but only for fedora. I installed kde in fedora and now it does not work in this even after reinstalling.
